pages.text: The Warped Mosco is an aggresive mini-boss version of a $(l:patchouli:creatures/alexsmobs/crimson_mosquito)Crimson Mosquito$(/l), appearing if one of these creatures sucks the blood of a $(l:patchouli:creatures/alexsmobs/mungus)Mungus$(/l).$(br2)On death, Warped Mosco may drop Hemolymph Sac and Warped Muscle.$(br2)Those items can be used with a Blood Sprayer to craft a powerfull weapon called Hemolymph Blaster.
